scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run styles && npm run scripts
scripts.develop: npm run build && npm run styles:watch & npm run scripts:watch & npm run serve
scripts.scripts:watch: npm run scripts && npm run scripts -- --watch --verbose
scripts.styles: mkdir -p dist/css && node-sass styles --output dist/css --include-path node_modules --source-map-contents --source-map-embed
scripts.styles:watch: npm run styles && npm run styles -- --watch styles --recursive & npm run poststyles -- --watch
